billing.question: How does billing work?
billing.answer: You're billed monthly or annually based on your chosen plan. You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel anytime.

limits.question: What happens if I exceed my limits?
limits.answer: You'll be notified when approaching limits. You can upgrade your plan or wait for the next billing cycle.

trial.question: Do you offer free trials?
trial.answer: Yes! Pro and Max plans include a 14-day free trial. No credit card required.

refund.question: What's your refund policy?
refund.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for all paid plans.

support.question: What support do you provide?
support.answer: Free users get community support. Pro users get email support. Max users get priority support.
